column1: Little Goat Diner////I had the Parathas Burrito which was SO flippin' good
column2: I don't even know how to begin. I was a little concerned
column3: because I've never done the sunny side up egg thing before
column4: but it was cooked just the way I like my eggs
column6: solid white. Win. The flavor combination was unique and perfect for my quirky breakfast palate.
